spam-blacklist:
# 
#  amahicahica micunus ta kasabelih a hekal URL i tina piazihan tu sulit amalangat.
# tina piazihan tu sulit silaheciay a subal dada’ i tina Wiki, kahica nu kawaw piazih tu tatenga’ay sacahamin-subal malangat piazihan tu sulit.
#  mahizaay a cudad piazih tu tatenga’ay  https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SpamBlacklist
#
# kamu-sakilul kese tinaku isasa’ay:
#   * amahicahica nay "#" tatebanan nu nisulitan angangan a tusil u buhci tu kamu amin 
#   * amahicahica caay inayi’ ku cacan a tusil apakuhica tatungusay pakatineng a zateng sapisasutili’ URL a angangan-kikay kalungangan  
 #
email-blacklist:
# 
#  amahicahica pangangan saca patayzaan a imyiyo(Email) puenengan i tina piazihan tu sulit amalangat.
# tina piazihan tu sulit silaheciay a subal dada’ i tina Wiki, kahica nu kawaw piazih tu tatenga’ay sacahamin-subal malangat piazihan tu sulit.
#  mahizaay a cudad piazih tu tatenga’ay  https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SpamBlacklist
#
# kamu-sakilul kese tinaku isasa’ay:
#   * amahicahica nay "#" tatebanan nu nisulitan  angangan a tusil u buhci tu kamu amin
#   *  amahicahica caay nayi’ ku cacan a silsil apahica ku tatungusay pakatineng a zateng sapihica sasutili’ imyiyo(Email) puenengan a angangan-kikay kalungangan  
#
spam-blacklisted-email: pasilsil tuway milangat piazihan-tu-sulit a imyiyo(email) puenengan
spam-blacklisted-email-signup: nipabeliay a imyiyo(email) puenengan ayzasa mapasilsil tu malangat piazihan tu sulit，la’cus pisaungay
log-description-spamblacklist: tina belih nasulit tu sacahamin matatungus patahtah malangat piazihan-tu-sulit a sikawaw.
